channel.title: Everything i need to know
channel.description: 1. how to change your home 2. how to change the tele's in your mage book 3. how to change the exp rate 4. how to add shops and add items to the shops 5. how to edit the hp and damage of a npc 6. how to change the color of an item 7. how to edit the stats of an item so they are not to powerfull 8. how to make a item such as a "candle" a equipable fighting item? "candle" is an exp 9. how to add or delete a quest 10. how to make a npc. underground such as blue dragons at taverly dungeon. 11. how to give npc's drops such as man drops bones

item.title: Everything i need to know
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

  1. how to change your home player.java
  2. how to change the tele’s in your mage book clickingmost.java
  3. how to change the exp rate client.java
  4. how to add shops and add items to the shops shops.cfg and client.java
  5. how to edit the hp and damage of a npc npc.cfg
  6. how to change the color of an item learn to model via metaseq
  7. how to edit the stats of an item so they are not to powerfull item.cfg
  8. how to make a item such as a “candle” a equipable fighting item? “candle” is an exp go to item.java or item4.java and add it under weapon slot
  9. how to add or delete a quest clickingmost.java and client.java and texthandler.java
  10. how to make a npc. underground such as blue dragons at taverly dungeon.

example

spawn = npcid	xxxx	yyyy	0	0	0	0	0	1

npcid is your npc id… the x and y’s are your coords… the 0’s are walking coords… and 1 is if it can walk or not…

find your cordinates and paste it in autospawn.cfg and change the other sother stuff… like id and name…

  1. how to give npc’s drops such as man drops bones npcdrops.cfg or npcdrops.java

most important is to compile

if you didn’t understand anything of theese go search for them in the forum please…

Read full topic

item.title: Everything i need to know
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

umm i can do them all but don’t wanna spend time on it lol for changing the tele’s in mage book goto clickingmost.java and ctrl+f the coords of the tele that you have atm and change to your new coords
